summary: This bill, the Child Care Nutrition Enhancement Act of 2025, amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act. It focuses on increasing reimbursements for meals and supplements under the child and adult care food program. The bill adds an additional 10-cent reimbursement per meal/supplement and makes adjustments to the reimbursement calculations for family and group day care homes. It also corrects a typo in the existing legislation.
